Summary: Rapidly flashing light near Minnesota-Wisconsin border joined by a second light.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Not Specified
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsThe following narrative was told to me(Richard Moss) by a writer for the St. Paul Pioneer-Press concerning a flashing light seen by a Hudson, Wisconsin resident. The narrative that follows is from a law officer's report obtained by the writer and was verbally communicated to me via telephone. Members of MUFON (state not specified) contacted Washington County about 10:15 PM on Sept. 24, 2007 to find out if there had been any sightings of unidentified flying objects in the skies over Washington County at around 10:15PM on Monday Sept. 24, 2007. An orb-like object was reportedly seen by a home owner in Hudson, Wisconsin five nights in a row. The witness (female) said that the light was flashing very fast, was bright, and hovered in the same spot at the Minnesota - Wisconsin border for what seemed like fifteen to twenty minutes - joined by a similar light.
